Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...”
Reviews.Author: SandTTraveling
Reviews.Content: stayed six nights christmas visiting inlaws huge price paid shower wonderful sbahn station street walking distance walls thin restful quiet night difficult understand eve complain nights loud hear cell phones ringing elevator stairwell offer escape noise mention elevator entire hotel pay paid parking 5 eur day internet provided cloud service expensive opted breakfast 10 eur person day pay parking lot plenty spots size cars advice watch step local apartment complex residents walk dogs grassy near lot pick husband unfortunate victim twice stay due proximity inlaws prices stay

Reviews.Title: “Business Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Oldbloke_TH
Reviews.Content: urgent business trip 1 day max hotel near schonefeld airport service food yes pay extra €5 airport shuttle direct 30 mins wifi cheaper period etc price bb balances half stuff pay hotels price dont anyway sbahn station couple minutes road city wide access yes residential blocks flats converted hotel

Reviews.Title: “berlin trip”
Reviews.Author: dbrnctt
Reviews.Content: stayed leonardo airport hotel berlin schönefeld 5 days explore berlin city hotel cheap paid £40 night bad 2 adults hotel clean fine bar resturant breakfast 10 euro person dear brek hotel eat time cheeper hotel easy road hotel train station berlin city s9 train change 5 stops train city s9 stop airport takes strait berlin city change train change berlin city tours price 20 euro 24 hours found bad bus stopped breaks stops time waisting found dont sit bus 10 15 min stops apart berlin city explore resturants service slow worse trying bill endthe rip german sausage tomato sauce 1 euro squirt sauce germans found rude directions money visit lots

Reviews.Title: “Great sleep and wonderful breakfast”
Reviews.Author: BPX
Reviews.Content: returning visit berlin city 21 airline easyjet airport eastern sector chose hotel near airport knowing germany finest transport networks berlin leading example wasnt disappointed leonardo hotel kilometer airport handy telephone shuttle sevice pick airport 5 euros hotel compfortable beds seperate showertoilet balcony morning decided breakfast 10 euros buffet breakfast superb choice reception staff extremely friendly helpful train station 200 metres hotel buy ticket 2euro 30 cents lasts 120 minutes takes centre berlin value hotel hesitation recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rosario_it
Reviews.Content: arrived airport late night called shuttle hotel pick 15 minutes hotel actually located 2 km airport car call shuttle hotel free charge train station hotel didnt breakfast included price following morning hotel service perfect sleep arrive airport staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “handy placed hotel for airport and not to difficult to get into Berlin centre”
Reviews.Author: keithkthr
Reviews.Content: hotel situated 10 mins drive airport amongst apartment blocks shuttle bus hire car lot bars restuarants hotel hotel bar food adequate hotel easy reach travelling car visit berlin centre train station 400 metres walk hotel buy day ticket train approx 7 euros centre requires train change difficult manage trip centre taxi cost 40 euro hotel reasonably priced terms accomodation food drink breakfast typical german staff friendly speak english hotel car opposite hotel overnight charge 5 euro

Reviews.Title: “Dingy area, Poor room, carefree attitude”
Reviews.Author: EBUman
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel airport prices reasonable arrived night hotel dingy unlit amongst blocks flats unfinished looked messy complaining staff told undergoing refurbishment quote poor attitude customer service choose stay

Reviews.Title: “Here we are again but in a better room!Service is still bad!”
Reviews.Author: Michael-TCS
Reviews.Content: visit berlin nights time leonardo airport hotel stay time time nice clean excellent shower time breakfast basic breakfast shuttle service airport mirage time airport answer isnt employ stay hotel airport stay hotel tell mind sbahn worry runs 247 station 5 minute walk time stay leonardo hotel time visit berlin stay closer schoenefeld airport hotel ps change carpet breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Grim, very grim”
Reviews.Author: gundersLondon
Reviews.Content: dive okbut add shuttle bus breakfast internet overpriced restaurant dinner close walk airport grim spot women careful 10 storey residential block absolutely ie bars restaurants etc nearby book late straight bed advice dont book fault booked mistaking intercity hotel near entrance airport
